transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Hello.
Customer: Ji Tapan ji se baat ho rahi hai meri?
Executive: Haan.
Executive: Sir, namaskar. Main senior head baat kar rahi hu Ujjwal ki manager IndiaMART office se.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Aapki baat hui hai sir Ujjwal ji ke saath. Aapne ek feedback diya tha ki aap satisfied nahi the.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Unki baat cheet se, unse jo bhi aapki baat cheet hui hai.
Customer: Main aapko question karta hu, main kis hisab se satisfied review bole the? Abhi itna mahina, mahina ho gaya, 9 mahina, 10 mahina ho gaya, 1 kg maal sell nahi hota hai. To kis hisab se aap log satisfied expect karte hai?
Executive: Sir, wo IndiaMART ki service ke liye nahi tha. Wo to aapka jo account bechte hai na, Ujjwal, unke liye feedback tha, aapne jo feedback diya.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Aapne Ujjwal ka jo sir rating review hota hai na, jo ek person ka rating hota hai, unko rate kiya, jo aapko wo service dete hai. Unki service mein koi kami hai sir? Matlab Ujjwal ke end se?
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji, main puch rahi hu sir, Ujjwal ki servicing mein koi kami hai ya koi issue hai unke end se?
Customer: Aapko Ujjwal ka service ka wo sab se wo sab aap log dekhiye kya wo aapka [inaudible]. Aapka [inaudible].
Customer: Ek second rukiye.
Executive: Haan?
Executive: Ji bataiye.
Customer: Ek minute hold kariye.
Executive: Okay. Okay. Okay. I am on hold, sir.
Customer: [inaudible] phone pe. Haan [inaudible].
Customer: [inaudible] phone karche.
Customer: [inaudible]
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Haan bolo dekhiye Ujjwal aapka yaha service kar rahe hai, mere rating ka koi matlab nahi. Mere rating ka kya hai? Main aapka IndiaMART ka pura usko. Abhi IndiaMART ko main kya batau boliye to. Main to yaha par order ke liye naam likhaya tha. Abhi itna mahina ho gaya koi bhi order [inaudible].
Executive: Matlab sir aapko order nahi mila hai. Aap IndiaMART ki jo service mil rahi hai usse satisfied nahi ho. Correct sir?
Customer: Haan haan correct sir. Ujjwal, Ujjwal ke saath mera kuch ye nahi hai.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Thik hai. Lekin service wo dekhte hai na, jaise aapka jo unke saath baat cheet hua uska tha, jo bhi aapka interaction hua unse. But koi dikkat nahi hai sir. Aap bata rahe ho mujhe ki issue aa raha hai aapko services se. Aapko sir inquiry jo hai wo nahi mil rahi hai, buylead nahi mil rahi hai? Kya issue aa raha hai sir batao aap mujhe?
Customer: Dekhiye 10 aadmi mere ko phone kiya hai. Ek aadmi [inaudible]. Sabko main bata chuka hu ki mere ko main West Bengal mein ruka hu. [inaudible]. Unka update hai sir ki matlab aap hyper local West Bengal ki buyleads chahte ho?
Customer: Haan. To aapko koi bhi yaha par West Bengal se koi bhi lead aata nahi hai. Bahar ka lead aata hai. Bahar mein to mera material jata nahi hai. Isliye main Ujjwal ko bol diya hu ki thik hai humko kya hai na aap se IndiaMART humko help kar nahi payega. To aap accept kar lijiye IndiaMART se humko koi matlab nahi hai. Mere ko phone mat kariye. I am not interested with IndiaMART. Thik hai. Isliye ki abhi itna din mein jab kuch bhi kar nahi paya aur kitna kar payenge? Ek saal to khatam hone ja raha hai. To kya hai hum, hum abhi IndiaMART dekhna chhod diya.
Executive: Achha sir, bas ek cheez aapse janni thi. Jaise aap bol rahe ho ki IndiaMART pe aapko conversion nahi mil raha hai, conversion nahi aa raha hai to aapne usko chhod diya use karna hai na? [inaudible]. Jo bhi aapka aata hai sab bahar ka Delhi, Haryana, Madras. Main to baar baar bol chuka hu main bahar mein maal bhej nahi sakta. Galti ho gaya IndiaMART mein naam likha ke.
Executive: To ye sir galti ki baat nahi hai Tapan sir.
Customer: To aap log mere ko phone mat kariye. Sabko bol dijiye please mere ko phone. Ek cheez main sabko bol ke bol ke. [inaudible]
Executive: Ye bas service ke liye call hai sir. Dekho aapki service bachi hai. Aapne paisa lagaya hai. [inaudible]
Customer: [inaudible] phone kare, kyu mere ko, mere ko phone kare disturb kar rahe hai? Kyu mere ko phone kar rahe hai?
Executive: Nahi disturb nahi karenge sir. Aapko business [inaudible]. Mere ko koi order nahi milta hai, kuch nahi milta hai. [inaudible]. Koi bhi, koi phone mat kariye.
Executive: Tapan sir order dilane ke liye hi call hai. Aap baat to samjho.
Customer: I am not interested with IndiaMART at all. Kuch ye log kar nahi payega. [inaudible] nahi hai. [inaudible] main bol chuka hu mere ko West Bengal mein lead dijiye de nahi pata hai. Khali bolta hai karunga karunga.
Executive: Aapko bas, aapko West Bengal ki lead chahiye na? Main aapka group create kar rahi hu sir. Ek week tak aapko aapke WhatsApp pe share karenge sir. Dekho main aapko surety nahi de rahi hu ki per day aapko West Bengal ki lead dungi. Kyunki sir waha se generate kam hoti hai. Waha pe generate kam hoti hai. Aap week mein sir main ek ya do buylead agar mere portal pe generate hoti hai to main aapko share kara dungi aapke WhatsApp pe.
Customer: Jo bhi karna hai kariye.
Executive: Aapko chalega sir? [inaudible] khatam ho gaya na, to isko khatam kariye.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not getting enough buyleads from West Bengal.

- Dissatisfied with IndiaMART's services.

- Receiving calls from IndiaMART despite disinterest.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to create a WhatsApp group.

- Will share West Bengal buyleads for a week.

- Clarified limited lead generation in West Bengal.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will create a WhatsApp group.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, west bengal, customer service, satisfaction, whatsapp group
